description: Abstract drawing of illegible handwriting on printed computer-generated financial statement; design for a poster.
inscription: Inscribed in pencil, verso, LR: 74.5.8 / KAPPEL, Hugh / Handwriting / Ben & Abby Grey Found.
medium: Graphite on green and off-white computer print-out paper
provenance: The artist, Minneapolis; Abby Weed Grey, St. Paul; Estate of Mrs. Abby Weed Grey; given to MIA, 1983.
title: Handwriting
